TopicTitle: How can I change the default Pilot?

Articles.Content: Is there any way to change the pilot order? My first pilot is always Bill, but I'd rather have Jeb without changing it on every single craft I launch. I googled it, but the only way I found is to send Bill far, far away.
In the app tab, the one with .... to the right open kerbal manager and you can change or remove kerbals from craft. later is handy for rescue missions
